mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id,u.name,ro.room_name,r.check_in_date,r.check_out_date, r.check_in_time,r.check_out_time,r.people,r.price,r.payment_time,r.status FROM reservation r JOIN room_info ro ON ro.room_id = r.room_id JOIN stay_info s ON s.stay_id = ro.stay_id JOIN host_info h ON h.host_id = s.host_id AND h.host_id = #{hostId} INNER JOIN user_info u ON u.user_id = r.user_id order by r.status

SELECT r.reservation_id, DATE_FORMAT(r.check_in_date, '%Y.%m.%d') check_in_date, DATE_FORMAT(r.check_out_date, '%Y.%m.%d') check_out_date, r.people, r.status,si.stay_name, si.location FROM reservation r JOIN room_info ri ON r.room_id = ri.room_id JOIN stay_info si ON ri.stay_id = si.stay_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} order by check_in_date
mapper.update: update reservation set status = #{status} where reservation_id = #{reservationId} and status = '예약 대기'
